posts.title: About social media kit
posts.content:
ðŸš€ Excited to share my latest open source project: **Social Media Kit** - A comprehensive tool for managing content across multiple social platforms!

ðŸŒŸ _It's completely free and open-source_!

ðŸŽ¯ What it does:
â€¢ **Multi-platform support** - LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Bluesky, and Mastodon in one tool
â€¢ **Smart text formatting** - Unicode bold/italic that works everywhere
â€¢ **Intelligent chunking** - Auto-splits long posts based on platform limits
â€¢ **Unified tagging** - Consistent syntax and management for cross-platform tagging
â€¢ **OAuth integration** - Secure authentication for direct posting
â€¢ **Rich emoji picker** - 600+ emojis across 6 categories
â€¢ **Post scheduling** - Set reminders with timezone support
â€¢ **Direct posting** - One-click posting with automatic thread creation

ðŸ’¡ **Why I built this:**
Tired of switching between platforms, dealing with character limits, and losing formatting? This tool streamlines your social media workflow while maintaining consistent branding across all platforms
